Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LaCT1(1-25) (N-terminal Fragment of LaCT1, synthetic AMPs, UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (53.19%) toscorpion	LACT1K: 24%; I=W=N: 12%. GRAVY: -0.832; Mol Wt: 2927.424; mol ex coeff: 16650.Activity: active against E. coli NBRC 3972 (MIC 1.0-2.0 uM), S. aureus NBRC 13276  (MIC 50-100 uM), and B. subtilis NBRC 3009 (MIC 1.0-2.0 uM).Insecticidal activity: LD50 89 nmol/g.
Literature Information.Author: Miyashita M, Sakai S, Okabe R, Kawai S, Kishimoto T, Kitanaka A, Mitani N, Nakagawa Y. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Identification and synthesis of a long-chain antimicrobial peptide from the venom of the Liocheles australasiae scorpion.
